name: mosquitto-ha
description: 基于 docker 集群化部署的 mosquitto

scripts.docker.build: docker build -t somax/mosquitto-ha:$npm_package_version ./mosquitto-ha && npm run docker.tag.latest
scripts.docker.publish: docker push somax/mosquitto-ha:$npm_package_version && npm run docker.publish.latest

author: MaXiaojun <somaxj@163.com>
